EmailTemplate.description: Push email sent to PJ mgmt control, subsidiary and PJ planning. Invoice confirmation
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience TEmail Notify that the Invoice Date Sent has been confirmed
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: The Invoice Date Sent has been confirmed by the Client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir or Madam,
For your information, the Invoice has been confirmed by the client {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.PJ_ByFor_Experience_Client_Full_Name__c}.
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
